issue.title: blog.csdn.net

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.62.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://blog.csdn.net/gatieme/article/details/78311841

### Ad Blocking

EasyList, AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

EasyPrivacy, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, EasyList Cookie List

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Comment

> login popups

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a439988c-c4b6-46ec-a7b5-ff74839264db)

</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: I think `##body > div#inplayer[align="center"]` is still good? `id` is more unique than `class`
